title: Alphabet hits $4 trillion valuation as Artificial intelligence push lifts Google parent past Apple
description: Stock has surged 65% in 2025 as Gemini AI, cloud growth and ad resilience boost confidence
content:
Alphabet hit a $4 trillion market valuation on Monday, as the Google parent's sharpened artificial intelligence focus allayed doubts about its strategy and thrust it back to the forefront of the high-stakes race.
The tech giant on Wednesday surpassed... [1849 chars]

title: Google (GOOGL) Confirms Multiyear AI Deal to Power Apple (AAPL) Models, Siri
description: Alphabet Inc.’s Google confirmed that it has entered a multiyear deal with Apple Inc. to power the iPhone maker’s artificial intelligence technology, including the Siri voice assistant.

title: Apple Strikes Deal With Google's Gemini to Power Siri's AI Features
description: Apple and Alphabet have reached a deal that will have Google Gemini powering Siri's artificial intelligence capabilities.
content:
Apple and Alphabet have reached a deal for Google's Gemini to power Siri's artificial intelligence capabilities.
The companies said these models would help power future Apple Intelligence features, including a more personalized Siri coming this year.... [1737 chars]

title: Nvidia To Invest $1 Billion In AI Drug Laboratory With Eli Lilly
description: Nvidia Corp. plans to invest $1 billion over five years in a new laboratory with Eli Lilly & Co., aiming to speed up the use of artificial intelligence in the pharmaceutical industry.
content:
Nvidia Corp. plans to invest $1 billion over five years in a new laboratory with Eli Lilly & Co., aiming to speed up the use of artificial intelligence in the pharmaceutical industry.

title: TSMC Q4 profit poised to soar 27% as AI demand drives growth
description: TAIPEI — TSMC, the world’s largest manufacturer of advanced artificial intelligence chips, is expected to post a 27-percent jump in fourth-quarter net profit to a record due to the seemingly insatiable demand for artificial intelligence (AI) infrastructure.

title: New 'humane intelligence' framework guides safer, more patient-centered AI in older-adult mental health care
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) is increasingly used to identify older adults for services, support people between visits, and guide referrals and care pathways. Yet much AI governance still emphasizes algorithms and infrastructure rather than what older adults and caregivers actually experience—especially in moments of vulnerability.

title: Philippine team search begins for global AI Olympiad
description: A RESEARCH and innovation unit of Ateneo de Manila University has been appointed as the country’s official coordinator for the International Olympiad in Artificial Intelligence (IOAI), placing it at the forefront of selecting and training the Philippine team for the global competition.

title: Alphabet’s Rise to $4 Trillion Cements Status as AI Trade Winner
description: Alphabet Inc. broke above a $4 trillion market capitalization on Monday, becoming one of the few companies to ever cross the threshold as investors increasingly see the Google parent as one of the biggest winners of the artificial intelligence boom.
